name: Sunny Health & Fitness Recumbent Exercise Bike
description: A comfortable, low-impact cardio solution with adjustable resistance and a supportive seat.
target_audience_match: Great for older adults who want a gentle, joint-friendly way to stay active without straining their back or knees.

name: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat
description: Provides a cushioned, non-slip surface for stretching, yoga, and floor exercises.
target_audience_match: Perfect for seniors easing into flexibility exercises with confidence and comfort.

name: TheraBand Resistance Bands Set
description: Color-coded bands offering varying resistance levels for strength training and rehabilitation.
target_audience_match: Ideal for seniors who want to gently maintain strength and joint mobility at their own pace.

name: LifePro Waver Vibration Plate
description: Enhances circulation, balance, and muscle strength through whole-body vibration therapy.
target_audience_match: Perfect for seniors looking to boost balance and circulation without intense movement.

name: Cubii JR1 Under-Desk Elliptical
description: A compact, seated elliptical machine for low-impact leg exercises while sitting.
target_audience_match: Excellent for seniors who want to stay moving while watching TV or reading.
